flex2.tools

Class Mxmlc

  • java.lang.Object
    • flex2.tools.Tool
      • flex2.tools.Mxmlc

  • public final class Mxmlc
extends Tool
    A command line tool for compiling Flex applications. Despite the name, in addition to .mxml files, this tool can be used to compile other file formats, like .as and .css.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws NoSuchMethodException,
                        InstantiationException,
                        IllegalAccessException,
                        InvocationTargetException
        The entry-point for Mxmlc. Note that if you change anything in this method, make sure to check Compc, Shell, and the server's CompileFilter to see if the same change needs to be made there. You should also inform the Zorn team of the change.
